maqras.text: Cun osmon dar ruzi qijomat sikofta savad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
va hangome ki zamin ʙozkasida va pahn mesavad va kuhhoi on dar ham kuʙida savad
va har ciro ki dar darun dorad az xazinaho va murdaho ʙerun partojad va xoli gardad
va ʙa farmoni Parvardigoras gus dihad va haq ʙuvad, ki cunin kunad
Ej inson, tu dar rohi Parvardigorat ranci farovon mekasi, ʙa'd az on ʙa Parvardigori xes dar ruzi qijomat didor meʙini, pas mukofoti amalatro ʙa fazlu adli Alloh xohi did
Har kas, ki nomaasro ʙa dasti rostas dihand, u mu'min ast
ʙa zudi az u ʙa tavri oson hisoʙ kunand
va sodmon dar cannat ʙa sui ahlas ʙozgardad
Ammo har kas, ki nomai a'molas az pusti sar doda savad, vaj kofir ast
ʙa zudi noʙudi va halokiro talaʙ kunad
Va ʙa otasi afruxta darojad
Zero u da r dunjo nazdi ahli xud sodmonu maƣrur zista ʙud
Va mepindost, ki hargiz ʙa nazdi Parvardigoras ʙaroi hisoʙ, ʙoznaxohad gast
Ore, Parvardigoras ʙa ahvoli u ʙino ʙud, az zamone, ki uro ʙijofarid, to zamone ki uro az nav zinda gardonid
Pas, Alloh megujad: ʙa surxii kanorai osmoni som savgand mexuram
va savgand ʙa saʙ va har ciro ki faro ʙigirad az corpojon va hasarot va ƣajraho
va savgand ʙa moh, cun purra savad nuri on
ki ej odamon, ʙa hole ʙa'd az holi digar xohed rasid
Ononro ci sudaast, ki ʙa Alloh va ruzi qijomat imon nameovarand
Va hangome ki Qur'on ʙar onho xonda savad, sacda namekunand
Balki kofiron haqro duruƣ mesumorand
Va Alloh ʙa on ci dar dil dorand, donotar ast
Pas ej Rasul, ononro ʙa azoʙi dardovare muƶda ʙideh
magar kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va Rasuli U imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, podosi hamesagi dorand
Alloh qasam mexurad ʙa osmon, ki doroi ʙurchost
va qasam ʙa ruzi qijomat, ki va'da dodaast, dar on xalqro cam' meovarad
va qasam ʙa guvoh va on ci ki ʙa on guvohi doda sudaast
ahli xandaqho halok sudand az ʙaroi on, ki mu'minonro azoʙ dodand
va otase afruxtand az hezumho
on goh ki ʙar kanori on otas nisasta ʙudand
va onon ʙar on ci ki ʙo mu'minon (azoʙ) mekardand, sohid ʙudand
Va az onho intiqom megiriftand, azoʙ mekardand mu'minonro, magar ʙaroi on ki ʙa Allohi ƣoliʙi loiqi sitois imon ovarda ʙudand
on Allohe, ki podsohii osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust va ʙar har cize guvoh ast va cize ʙar U pusida nest
Alʙatta onon, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro sikanca kardand, to ki onhoro az dini Alloh ʙozdorand, sipas tavʙa nakardand, azoʙi cahannam va azoʙi otas ʙaroi onhost
Begumon ʙaroi kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙihisthoest, ki dar on darjoho corist va on komjoʙii ʙuzurgest
Alʙatta intiqom giriftani Parvardigori tu az dusmanonas saxt ast
Ust, ki naxust pajdo mekunad va pas az marg zinda mesozad
U ʙaxsojandavu dustdoranda ast, ʙaroi tavʙakunandagon
Ust sohiʙi Arsi ʙuzurg
Har ciro iroda kunad, ʙa ancom merasonad va cize mone'i irodai U suda nametavonad
Ej Rasul, ojo xaʙari laskarho ʙa tu rasidaast
Laskarhoi Fir'avnu qavmi Samud, ki onho pajomʙaroni xesro duruƣ ʙarovardand va ʙa azoʙi Alloh giriftor sudand
Ore, onon, ki rohi kufr pes giriftaand, ojathoi Allohro tasdiq nakardand
va Alloh az hama su ʙo ilmu qudrati xud ʙar onho ihota dorad
Balki, in Qur'oni ʙuzurgvor va oliqadr ast
Dar Lavhi Mahfuz coj dorad! Hec goh taʙdilu tahrif naxohad sud
Alloh savgand jod mekunad ʙa osmon va sitorae, ki saʙonagoh pajdo mesavad
Va tu ci doni, ki sitorae, ki dar saʙ pajdo mesavad, ci hast
Sitorai duraxsone hast, ki torikii saʙro mesikofad
Kase vucud nadorad, magar ki ʙar u faristae vakil karda sudaast ʙaroi navistani amalhoi u
Pas odami, ki ruzi az nav zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidanro inkor mekunad, ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarida sudaast
Az oʙi manii cahandai nociz ofarida sudaast
ki az mijoni ustuxoni pusti mard va ustuxoni sinai zan ʙerun meojad
Begumon, Alloh ʙa ʙozofarinisi u tavonost
ruze, ki rozhoi nihon oskor mesavand. Va amali soleh az amali fosid cudo megardad
Ongoh uro tavonoi va jovare naʙosad
Savgand ʙa osmoni ʙozʙoranda
Savgand ʙa zamine, ki dar on sikofiho hast az onho gijohho merujand
Begumon, Qur'on suxani ravsan va cudokunandai haq az ʙotil ast
Va on hazl nest
Begumon, onone ki pajomʙar sallalllohu alajhi va sallamro ʙovar namekunand hilae meandesand, to Qur'on va rasulro duruƣ ʙarorand va ʙotili xudro ta'jid namojand
Va Man niz corae meandesam, to haqro nusrat diham, agarci kofironro nopisand ojad
Pas kofironro muxlat deh, andak muxlatason deh! Va dar furud omadani azoʙ ʙa onho sitoʙ makun
